column4: i am mustard5, i need w32codecs and libdvdcss2.. any idea where i can get them from?
and when are the backports gonna go up?
backports are not available for breezy until dapper development starts
I can show you where to get them
did you get that from ubotu?
you know how to edit sources.list?
open a terminal and type 'sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
ok where were we..I got disconnected
now pick one of those links to hoary-extras and add it to the bottom
the one second one that starts with deb
deb http://ubuntu-backports.mirrormax.net/ hoary-extras main universe multiverse restricted
breezy is using hoary-extras for now
you getting the w32codecs from the w32deb links I gave you?
